text: This is a sample document about accessibility guidelines. The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) are developed by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) in cooperation with individuals and organizations around the world. Published on December 11, 2018.
title: Accessibility Guidelines Document
